title: The First Half of My Life - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Female Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Yi Shu   亦舒
description:
Zi Jun had always been dependent on her husband, as her life lacked the willpower to be independent.

 After her husband deserted her, she began to throw herself into her work. 

While she seeks an occupation and fights for an independent position in society, Zi Jun displays her intelligence and wisdom, as her youthfulness shines through, thus gaining many people’s respect and admiration.

 In the end, she receives happiness and a beautiful outcome in her love life and work life.>
